name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 24, a Hebei netizen reported that he received a text message from the Hebei Medical Insurance Bureau urging him to pay his medical insurance. The text message said that he should register for insurance and pay the premiums in time. If he did not register for insurance and pay the premiums during the concentrated payment period, he would not be able to enjoy medical insurance benefits in time after he became ill in 2025.
The netizen said, "I was still hesitant about whether to pay or not, but after seeing this text message with an imperative tone, I completely didn't want to pay, as if I owed you 400 yuan."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 24, Jiangxi. The delivery of the Jiuyuefu real estate project in Fuzhou was delayed, and the owners protested their rights in front of the government building. A large number of people were present to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 23, Weihai Municipal Third Hospital, Shandong Province
A boy suddenly convulsed after receiving an IV in the hospital and died. The director of the hospital once said: "The compensation is only 200,000 yuan, the child's life is worthless."
A large number of people gathered in dissatisfaction, and the police later cleared the scene and blocked the surrounding areas. There are still a few entries in the Douyin search for "Weihai Hospital", but most of them have been deleted
Informed netizens said: The injected drugs are collectively purchased generic drugs, with many impurities and poor quality, which can easily lead to death from allergic shock

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Participating in medical insurance according to law is the right and obligation of every citizen ——Hebei Medical Insurance Administration emphasizes
The entry on Baidu Encyclopedia explains "obligation":
Obligation is legally mandatory.
Obligation is the symmetry of "rights". The law restricts citizens or legal persons to make or prohibit certain behaviors. In a socialist society, obligations and rights are consistent and inseparable. The responsibilities that citizens or legal persons should fulfill according to the law, such as military service.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 24 Huizhou Guanghong Technology
A student worker who was doing internship at the factory posted a post complaining: I wanted to leave early on the 19th, but the foreman refused to sign the resignation form. After the resignation form was signed on the 24th, I was told that I had to follow the resignation process as a regular employee and could only leave one month after signing (it happened to be winter vacation at that time), and I would not get paid for the 20 days before leaving in January. If I leave without working, my December salary will be deducted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 22, Xi County, Xinyang, Henan Province organized the masses to engage in a "human-grass war". In the process of promoting the improvement of the human settlement environment, it was required that the stubble of wild trees and weeds on both sides of the main roads such as national roads, provincial roads, and county roads be left at about 10 cm.
They also painted white walls and added green tiles to 12 houses along the road in a village, but no renovations were made to the rest of the houses in the village
Nine people including the deputy mayor and the county party secretary were given a serious warning within the party, and no further punishment or dismissal was given.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Huainan, Anhui, four special police officers stood guard at the school gate with rifles, and at least two staff members were filming with gimbals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 24, Yang Maoyue's account was banned and became a hot search on Weibo. Yang Maoyue had posted a video mocking post-2000 college students who could not find jobs. After this incident, his Douyin account quickly lost followers. As of now, the number of followers lost is as high as nearly 1.3 million.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 21st, Zhengzhou, Henan, Yuexiu Jinyue Wenhua, owners gathered to protest against forced delivery of houses, and the houses had serious quality problems
December 23rd, Zhengzhou, Henan, unfinished Xinzheng City Kangqiao Nayunxi, owners gathered in front of the petition center to demand "serve the people" and solve the unfinished problems
December 23rd, Yulin, Shaanxi, Shenmu Chengtou Phoenix City, owners crowded the sales office to defend their rights and developers to reduce prices

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 19, Wuhan, Hubei, Wuhan Wanlong Plaza closed down, the mall was deserted, owners gathered to block the door, banged bowls and pots, and used loud speakers to play slogans to protect their rights, demanding the mall: "Give me back my hard-earned money"
The video shows several police cars arriving at the scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 23, Wenzhou Rentian Village villagers gathered to defend their rights due to the quality of resettlement housing
Villagers said: When building resettlement housing, the government forcibly expropriated land and forcibly removed the wheat that was about to mature to build houses. Although they were allocated resettlement quota compensation, they still paid a lot of housing construction fees
The village committee forced villagers to pay the balance when the resettlement housing did not pass the housing quality inspection. Before the distribution of houses began, many cracks appeared in the houses, and the steel bars were exposed and broken

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 16th, Pucheng County, Weinan, Shaanxi, workers held up a black banner with white letters to block the entrance of the Party and Mass Activity Center, demanding their hard-earned money from Huatong Road Bridge Company
December 20th, Puyang, Henan, Guangzhou Second Construction Engineering Company Global Digital Technology City Project, workers gathered at the door, writing red letters on their clothes to demand their wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 21st Huaiji County, Zhaoqing, Guangdong: Farmers protested against the government's demolition of their homesteads without the consent of the owners. The police had a fierce argument with the villagers at the scene, and some villagers were forcibly taken into a car and taken away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 24, the houses of residents in Songhe Community, Macheng, Huanggang, Hubei were forcibly demolished due to the construction of the Yangtze River High-speed Railway.
A large number of suspected police officers with shields and forks were dispatched to the scene, and a staff member forcibly pushed down the aunt who stayed at the scene. In the video, the sound of suspected fists hitting flesh can be heard. The aunt was also crying and shouting that the staff had beaten her. Then the staff forcibly dragged the aunt away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 23, villagers in Xushui Village, Zhengzhou, Henan Province, gathered to defend their rights and demand transitional fees for house demolition and resettlement. The transitional fees were only 200 to 300 yuan per month, but they still could not be paid.
In the comment area, some netizens said: Zhengzhou Erqi District has owed transitional fees for nearly 5 years. Other places have also generally owed transitional fees for three or four years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens in the comment section also said that the transition period was originally 18 months, but the resettlement housing has not been built in the past two years. Some netizens also said that the house has not been built even after seven or eight years of demolition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 23, the owners of Zhongjun World City in Rizhao, Shandong Province, gathered in front of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China to defend their rights and demanded that the bank "return my hard-earned money". It is suspected that because the project was left unfinished, the bank illegally released the money in the supervision account to the developer in advance, causing the developer to run away with the money. The owners lost both their money and their houses, and were also burdened with mortgage debts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 23, Shanxi Linfen Zhuangyuan Mansion Owners accused the developer of false advertising and put up banners to protect their rights. The banners were snatched away by the property security guards, who insulted and pushed the owners, and a physical conflict broke out on the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 23, Tengzhou, Shandong, suspected investors defended their rights in front of the municipal government. The police used a loudspeaker to speak to the investors. The video has been deleted by Douyin. December 23, Hengyang, Hunan, Yashilin Xiangyuan, owners gathered to remove the "owners' committee". December 22, Wuhan, Hubei, Guobo New City D11 Internet celebrity real estate, owners gathered at the sales office to shout slogans to defend their rights, resolutely refused to accept the house, and made a poster summarizing the housing problems to defend their rights. The poster showed that the real estate had multiple false propaganda

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many truck drivers held banners to protest against low freight rates, which were not even enough to cover costs, and called for a three-month nationwide truck suspension.
The video said that the freight platform lowered the price to 2 yuan/km or even lower (which is lower than taxis). This price is already a loss but people still accept orders. The platform and the government should regulate and set a minimum price.
The video also called for a three-month nationwide truck suspension strike protest. Anyway, it is already a loss, so it doesn't matter if it loses another three months.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Iran's Supreme Committee, which is responsible for ensuring internet security, voted on Tuesday to lift a ban on WhatsApp and Google Play that had been restricted for more than two years, state media reported.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, gymnast Wu Liufang was punished by the platform, and her number of fans dropped sharply from 6.3 million to 44,000.
On December 24, Li Liang, vice president of Douyin Group, responded to this: There are great differences in the judgment and treatment of Yuandong, and we still have to implement it according to the relevant laws, regulations and guidance requirements of the country.
Guishan Ge, the author of "Sunny and Cheerful Kong Yiji", said that he was blocked in violation of relevant regulations, but he still doesn't understand which regulations were violated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"No malicious recollection"
On December 25, a blogger posted a microblog of CCTV and People's Daily celebrating Christmas ten years ago, but the picture was blocked by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Christmas Eve movie box office data from 2011 to 2024, this year's Christmas Eve movie box office has plummeted, even worse than during the epidemic period.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, some netizens reported that the Beijing Anding Hospital, which conducted a mental evaluation on Li Yixue, had a business license that had expired. After being exposed, the hospital quickly modified its business registration information, which currently shows that it is valid until October 16, 2029.
As of now, Li Yixue's account has been banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to a report on December 23, Putin said in an interview: The previous generation of Russian politicians did not hesitate to "destroy their own country" to join the so-called "civilized world" of the West. Despite this, they still gained nothing because the West was committed to destroying Russia.
Some netizens questioned whether Putin was passing the buck.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 24, Fengqiu, Henan. A teacher at Jingjie Primary School taught students: "What Santa Claus is there? It is the Chinese Volunteer Army that brings you peace." "December 24 is the day of the victory of the Battle of Changjin Lake in the War to Resist U.S. Aggression and Aid Korea." "So please remember that on December 24, we are celebrating the anniversary of the Battle of Changjin Lake."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 25 (Released) Some netizens reported that Tianjin No. 2 Middle School required adult students to vote for a person named Niu Yuming as a National People's Congress representative.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 23, a lawyer explained, "Will you be sentenced if you smash the Yasukuni Shrine toilet and come back?" The lawyer said: "If you really smash the Yasukuni Shrine, you must run fast and swiftly, because if you are caught in the local area, you will be sentenced. But if you can successfully return, it is highly likely that nothing will happen to you, and you may be regarded as a patriotic hero and receive flowers and applause."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Ms. Xie from Chengdu, Sichuan, was abused 16 times by her husband between 2021 and 2023, causing multiple internal injuries and requiring her to wear a feces bag for life.
On December 24, He Mouyang was charged with intentional injury and abuse in the Wuhou District Court of Chengdu.
Ms. Xie said in an interview: Even if she unplugged her mobile phone card, no matter where she fled, her husband could find her with "Skynet".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a man filmed rows of tents under a bridge in Guangzhou. He said that some delivery guys and workers chose to live in tents under the bridge in order to save rent.
On December 23, many media reported the incident.
On December 25, the tents under the bridge had been cleared and the original video had been deleted. The man said, "The higher-ups said there is a good solution and they will arrange these people."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A LinkedIn account signed with the name of "Chinese Communist Youth League" posted a job posting last week, claiming that it was recruiting "deputy party secretary" and "party secretary" for the "Ngee Ann Polytechnic Party Branch" in Singapore.
Singapore Ministry of Home Affairs: The police have received a report and the Ministry of Home Affairs is investigating.
It is reported that the job posting has been removed from LinkedIn and the account can no longer be displayed. It is currently impossible to determine whether the account is related to the Chinese Communist Party or the Communist Youth League.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 24, Zhejiang. A blogger posted that he transferred some money (not a large amount) at 11pm and then received a call from the anti-fraud center. His bank card was also frozen, even though he repeatedly stressed that there was no fraud.
Then the police came to verify for a long time and said that it would be unfrozen after 48 hours.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 24, some netizens complained that they originally wanted to watch the movie "Changjin Lake" to show their support on the "Changjin Lake Battle Victory Anniversary", but found out that they had to pay for it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 25, People's Daily launched the "China-US Friendship and Cooperation Stories" collection activity.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 24, Sichuan. A man in military uniform, with a grenade tied around his waist and an explosive pack on his back, holding the national flag in his hand, shouted to passers-by, "Christmas Eve is theirs, not ours. Our Christmas Eve was paid for by our ancestors with their blood. Don't forget history and don't worship foreign things!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 24, Henan. The Christmas tree outside a dessert shop was asked to be taken down. The shop owner said: "They said they wouldn't let it be celebrated during the Western Festival. They just came over and said they were going to take down the Christmas tree."
 December 25, Henan. Workers are dismantling the Christmas tree outside the shopping mall. The photographer said, "Christmas has not yet passed, and they started dismantling it early in the morning. It seems that foreigners are not very popular with the holiday."
 December 24, Shenyang, Liaoning. Vendors dressed in Santa Claus clothes set up stalls but were stopped by staff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens responded: Let’s celebrate our own Christmas

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Jiang Zhuojun, a Chinese man who helped the internet celebrity "Iron Head" to graffiti the Yasukuni Shrine, was sentenced to 8 months' detention today. He said, "I don't hate the Yasukuni Shrine, and I love Japanese culture, I just want to protect the ocean." The defense said that Jiang Zhuojun "just prepared the spray paint, not the direct perpetrator." Based on this, the Tokyo District Court believed that "it is absolutely unacceptable to express one's own views and take illegal actions" and sentenced him to 8 months.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 25, the ceiling of a classroom at the Qishan Campus of Fujian Normal University suddenly fell off. Students were in the classroom at the time of the incident. Some students were injured by blocks of concrete and were sent to the hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Japanese Foreign Minister: Japan will relax the conditions for issuing tourist visas to Chinese people
According to a report on December 25, Japanese Foreign Minister Takeshi Iwaya revealed at a meeting on the 25th that the conditions for issuing tourist visas to Chinese people will be relaxed.
Specifically, it includes the establishment of a tourist visa with a validity period of 10 years and the extension of the number of days that group travel visas can stay from 15 days to 30 days.
The above relaxation measures are expected to be implemented in the spring of 2025 after preparations are completed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 25, Meizhou, Guangdong. It was revealed online that Wuhua County Shuizhai Middle School required all students to sign a letter of commitment: "If I commit suicide or self-harm, it has nothing to do with the school. I, my parents or guardians will not claim any losses or compensation from the school for any reason."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 19, the School of Marxism at Gansu University of Political Science and Law issued a proposal to "firmly maintain cultural confidence and not celebrate foreign festivals". 
The letter volume of the Complete Works of Marx and Engels mentioned: In 1868, Marx wrote to Engels: If you can send me a few pounds for the upcoming Christmas week, I will be very welcome.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: “Being able to get along with both sides and switch easily”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 25, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs: China and Japan reached 10 consensuses.
Among them: Supporting the establishment of sister schools between primary and secondary schools in the two countries ​​.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 25 (Released) Henan. A college student challenged himself to find a job that complies with the labor law. He interviewed several jobs in succession, but the benefits offered by the HR were basically less than 3,000 yuan per month, requiring more than ten hours of work per day, without overtime pay and five insurances and one fund.
One of the HR said that the first month's salary was only 1,000 yuan. "If you are in Henan, you can't find a job with five insurances and one fund if you don't work in a factory."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 24, Hu Xijin posted on Weibo that some young people in society treat Christmas Eve as a fashion, which is a personal matter. If society does not provide a supportive atmosphere, such a situation will gradually become the norm in Chinese society.
